name: Muerte's Arena
description: Voxels and Vector Graphics combine in a VR Arcade Shoot Em Up where you must always be on your toes and aim true.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD FX-6300, Intel Core i5 6400 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Oculus Rift with Touch Controls required.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7
